Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Thulsan forces are too strong to overcome in a direct assault. We need to weaken them.

Eliminate {@LinkCreature:27#10#Thulsan slayers}, {@LinkCreature:27#11#arcanists}, {@LinkCreature:27#8#berserkers}, {@LinkCreature:27#9#dreadweavers}, and {@linkcreature:27#12#cleavers}.

Report to Sarvasia when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
